ItemBGDesc: A torus that seems to possess the power of Harmony. It only has one surface. No matter where you depart, you're destined to not reach your destination. A tiny complaint would be that it is a bit sticky, as if it does not want to let you go. "All are connected and the wind of blessing breathes across the lands!"

ItemComefrom.Desc: Stargazer Navalia: Entranced Ingenium: Obedient Dracolion or other enemies
